Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Texas in 1979...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1982, off Pat Zachry (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/2/1982, off Bill Atkinson (CHW)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1982, hitting .577 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1982, hitting .369 with 2 HR, 15 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Boston on 7/8/1982...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Oakland on 9/28/1982...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Cleveland on 4/29/1984...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1985, hitting .484 with 1 HR, 10 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against California on 4/3/1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1986, hitting .484 with 1 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1986, hitting .430 with 5 HR, 31 RBI...
Injured on 7/12/1986 with a Pulled Thigh Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Hit for the cycle against Detroit on 9/20/1987...
Injured on 8/26/1988 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Won World Series with Texas in 1989...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1990, hitting .545 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Injured on 6/25/1991 with a Fractured Wrist, out for 3-4 weeks...
Traded from Texas to St. Louis on 7/7/1992 (Going to STL: 1B D. Mattingly. Going to TEX: P M. Whisenant)...
Won World Series with St. Louis in 1993...
